Access Code:
If access code is used then you need to add query string as:
http://magento-url/any-page?tp=1&code=code-entered-above in order to turn on the template path hints. Else you can simply use ?tp=1.
Note that this technique works well both for frontend and admin part.
访问代码:
如果设置了“访问代码”，需要像这样访问：
http://magento-url/any-page?tp=1&code=访问代码
才能启动“模板路径提示”。否则，你只需要使用?tp=1。
注意：前端和后台都可以使用本功能。
